articles.title: Spokesman for DPRK FM Condemns Japanese Rightist Conservatives for Concealing Its Crime-Woven Past
articles.content:
Spokesman for DPRK FM Condemns Japanese Rightist Conservatives for Concealing Its Crime-Woven Past
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea released the following statement on Friday as regards the disclosure of the attempt of the Japanese rightist conservatives to conceal its crime-woven past on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of the defeat of the Japanese imperialists:
					 Abe's "statement to mark the 70th anniversary of the end of WWII" announced through a decision of the meeting of ministers of the Japanese Cabinet did not refer to the honest admission and apology for Japan's history of aggression.
					
					 Japan's aggression of Korea and colonial rule for over 40 years was the most ferocious and barbarous ones in the world.
					
					 Nevertheless, Japan is talking about future and responsibility and contribution in the international community, without making an apology and reflection on having not yet liquidated the monstrous crimes and unspeakable damage done to the Korean people. It is an unpardonable mockery of the Korean people and an act of deceiving the international community.
					
					 After its defeat, too, Japan joined in the Korean war and suppressed Koreans in Japan, pursuant to the U.S. policy for invading the DPRK. Japan has run the whole gamut of intrigues to block the reunification of Korea and frantically pursued a hostile policy towards the DPRK. 
					
					 Having added to the crimes against the Korean nation, Japan is becoming so crafty as to cover up its past crimes and describe itself as a "contributor to peace".
					
					 We categorically denounce and reject such act of Japan as a shameless act of challenging our sovereignty and dignity, international justice and human conscience.
					
					 Japan inflicted huge disasters on the people in Asia and those in other countries of the world by waging wars of aggression, seized by the ambition for the "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere" in the past century. But in the long run, it drank a bitter cup of defeat.
					
					 Japan should not seek the way of ruin by opting for the revival of a war state and overseas aggression under the signboard of "proactive pacifism" but gain trust from the DPRK and neighboring countries, to begin with, by liquidating all the past crimes including hideous crimes against the Korean people.
					
					 The will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to force Japan to pay for the crimes committed for one century and have their towering grudge settled is growing stronger as the days go by.

articles.title: National Meeting Celebrates 70th Anniversary of Korea's Liberation
articles.content:
National Meeting Celebrates 70th Anniversary of Korea's Liberation
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- A national meeting for celebrating the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation took place here on Friday.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Kim Ki Nam and other senior party, state and army officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly, officials of the party and armed forces organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials of the institutions and industrial establishments in the city, bereaved families of revolutionary martyrs, heroes, those who had the honor of being received by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, labor innovators, delegations of overseas Koreans and compatriots who came to the socialist homeland to celebrate the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present there on invitation were a delegation of the Russian Federation Council on a visit to the DPRK to participate the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation, foreign guests, diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies and military attaches of foreign embassies here.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, made a report.
					
					 The reporter said that Korea's liberation was the brilliant victory achieved by the concerted efforts of the nation in the independent revolutionary spirit of President Kim Il Sung and pursuant to his Juche-based revolutionary line.
					
					 The President firmly prepared the Korean People's Revolutionary Army politically and in a military way in the flames of the 20 year-long anti-Japanese revolution and inflicted death and sent shiver down the spines of the Japanese imperialist aggressors with his hit-and-run guerrilla tactics and methods with which he swept across the vast land of Mt. Paektu, the reporter noted, and went on:
					
					 In the historic period when the great event of national liberation was imminent, he nurtured the strategic plan for combining the general attack of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army with the all-people uprising and joint operations behind the enemy lines and worked hard to carry it out.
					
					 The brigandish Japanese imperialists were defeated on August 15, Juche 34 (1945) along with the gunfire of the anti-Japanese war sounded by the arms of Mt. Paektu, and the historic cause of national liberation the Korean people had longed for was realized with success.
					
					 The liberation of Korea put an end to the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists that had lasted for nearly half a century and helped Korean people retake the sovereignty, and ushered in a bright path of building new Korea.
					
					 Over the seven decades since the liberation the DPRK has made the history of brilliant victory and epoch-making changes unprecedented in the national history spanning five thousand years under the wise guidance of the President and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The President who gave the origin of Songun in the flames of the anti-Japanese revolution successfully realized the cause of building the regular armed forces though everything ran short after the liberation, and provided a sure military guarantee for the independence and sovereignty of the country and its prosperity.
					
					 The Fatherland Liberation War was the grimmest ordeal for the young DPRK, but its army and people turned out in the anti-U.S. resistance under the leadership of the President and demonstrated matchless self-sacrificing spirit and popular heroism, thereby defeating the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world and honorably defending the freedom and independence of the country.
					
					 Kim Jong Il developed in depth the Songun idea and line of the President and pursued the Songun politics in all fields as demanded by the changed situation and the developing revolution, thereby ushering in a great heyday of bolstering up national power.
					
					 The President and Kim Jong Il successfully applied the socialist ideal of Juche, setting a worldwide example in socialist construction and opening a new era of prosperity.
					
					 The proud history and tradition of the country liberated and glorified by them is being given steady continuity by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The invincible might of Songun Korea is being more strikingly demonstrated as Kim Jong Un is ushering in a new heyday of strengthening the People's Army and developing the defence industry under the unfurled banner of Songun and energetically leading the struggle to resolutely smash the vicious war moves of the U.S. imperialists and their followers and their racket for stifling the DPRK.
					
					 Today we are facing the sacred tasks to glorify the new century of Juche as a proud one for the final victory while giving fuller play to the dignity and spirit of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 No matter how much water may flow under the bridge and no matter what ordeals we may face, we should invariably advance along the road of independence, Songun and socialism taken by the President and Kim Jong Il all their lives and thus build the best power in the world, the people's paradise to be looked up by the world.
					
					 The looks of liberated Korea visualized by the President in the secret forests of Mt. Paektu was the one reunified and prospering land and country.
					
					 National reunification is the supreme task and the greatest cherished desire of the Korean people which brooks no further delay as they have experienced the seven-decade history of pain and tragedy of national division caused by foreign forces following the liberation of the country.
					
					 We will resolutely shatter all challenges and obstructions of the separatist forces at home and abroad and build a reunified prosperous country on this land without fail true to the noble intention of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Heads and Leading Members of Delegations of Overseas Koreans

They included Pak Ku Ho, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, Choe Un Bok, chairwoman of the General Association of Koreans in China, Rim Min Sik, chairman of the Overseas Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification, Yun Kil Sang, chairman of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S., Kim Chil Song, first vice-chairman of the International United Confederation of Koreans, Kim Su Hae, chairman of the Federation of Koreans in Canada, Ri Tong Je, chairman of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, Nam Ju Hyon, vice-chairperson of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, and Son Hyong Gun, chairman of the Association of South Koreans in Japan for Democracy and Reunification. articles.title: International Event for Celebrating Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Held
articles.content:
International Event for Celebrating Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Held
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- An international event for celebrating the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation was held at the People's Palace of Culture on Friday under the co-sponsorship of the preparatory committees for celebrating the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation in different countries and regions of the world and the Korean Committee for Solidarity with the World People.
					 Present at the event were delegations and delegates on a visit to the DPRK to celebrate the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation, foreign diplomatic envoys and staff members of foreign embassies here.
					
					 Present there were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who double as chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Solidarity with the World People, officials concerned and Pyongyangites.
					
					 The floor was taken by Helmi El Hadidi, chairman of the Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization, Phanindra Raj Pant, secretary of the Nepalese Committee for Promotion of Reunification of Korea, Estuardo Martinez Perez, president of the General Kim Jong Il Peruvian Amicable Institute and secretary general of the Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, and Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark－DPRK Friendship Association.
					
					 They said that President Kim Il Sung led the anti-Japanese war to victory for 20 years despite all difficulties and trials baffling human imagination and thus achieved the historic cause of Korea's liberation, adding that this was the one of the greatest feats performed by him.
					
					 They praised the feats leader Kim Jong Il performed by carrying forward and developing the idea and cause of the President in all fields, turning the Workers' Party of Korea into an invincible party and building the DPRK as an independent and prosperous thriving socialist nation.
					
					 They expressed belief that Korea would be reunified without fail, a thriving nation be built and the human cause of independence advance along the road of victory thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un who is successfully translating the desire of the President and Kim Jong Il into reality.
					
					 The U.S. is the chief architect of Korea's division, they said, denouncing the hostile forces' hostile policy toward the DPRK and moves to  isolate and stifle the DPRK through the aggressive nuclear war exercises and non-existent "human rights" racket.
					
					 They vowed to carry on the struggle shoulder to shoulder with the Korean people till Korea is reunified under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, true to the reunification program set forth by the President and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk in her speech expressed belief that dear foreign friends would extend invariable support and solidarity to the Korean people in their efforts to achieve the country's reunification and build a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in International Celebration
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in International Celebration
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un on Friday received a letter from the participants in the international event for celebrating the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The letter said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung embarked on the road of the anti-Japanese war with a great ambition for the revolution in his teens, putting an end to the Japanese imperialists' decades-long colonial rule and thus achieving the historic cause of the country's liberation.
					
					 These immortal feats performed by the President helped the Korean people enjoy an independent and creative life as the master of their destiny and gave strong impetus to the anti-imperialist national liberation struggle of the oppressed people in the world. 
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il firmly defended socialism, added shine to the DPRK as a political, ideological and military power despite the imperialists' persistent moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK and adopted the historic north-south joint declarations, paving a bright way of achieving Korea's reunification. 
					
					 One can safely say that the contemporary history of the DPRK is an immortal history recorded with the outstanding feats of the President and Kim Jong Il who led the DPRK along the road of independence with their experienced and tested politics, protected the peace and stability in Northeast Asia and other parts of the world and made a great contribution to the human cause of independence.
					
					 While witnessing and experiencing for ourselves the reality of the DPRK undergoing changes with each passing day, we came to have firm conviction that the Korean people will surely build a prosperous and thriving reunified socialist nation and the DPRK will shed more brilliant rays all over the world under the leadership of Your Excellency.
					
					 We will as ever voice unequivocal support and solidarity for all lines and policies put forward by Your Excellency and always stand by the Korean people.

articles.title: Reception in Russia Celebrates Anniversary of Korea's Liberation
articles.content:
Reception in Russia Celebrates Anniversary of Korea's Liberation
Moscow, August 13 (KCNA) -- The DPRK embassy in Moscow gave a reception on Aug. 12 on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Present there on invitation were Vice Foreign Minister Igor Morgulov and personages of political parties, government ministries, institutions and organizations of Russia. They included the United Russia Party,  Communist Party of the Russian Federation, Liberal Democratic Party, "A Just Russia", Party for Peace and Unity, the All-Union  Communist Party of Bolsheviks, Communist Party of the Soviet Union, Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Ministry of Defense, Ministry of Development of Far East, Ministry of Economy and Development, Ministry of Extraordinary Situation, Ministry of Transport, Ministry of Education and Science, Ministry of Culture, Federal Emigration Bureau, Gazprom Company, Chamber of Commerce and Industry, Academy of Sciences, Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, Orchestra of the 21st Century, Moscow Veterans' Committee and the United Confederation of Koreans in Russia.
					
					 Present there were DPRK Ambassador to Russia Kim Hyong Jun and his embassy officials. 
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bunches of flowers before the full-length picture of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them. 
					
					 They looked round photos dealing with feats of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un, DPRK books and handcrafts and stamps.
					
					 The vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of Russia said that he recollected the heroic feats of the soldiers of the Soviet Union and patriots of Korea who dedicated their lives to the freedom and independence of Korea on the occasion of the anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					
					 He went on: 
					
					 The Russian and Korean peoples are steadily developing the bonds of friendship, good neighborliness and cooperation.
					
					 The two countries achieved significant successes in various fields and huge experiences of cooperation.
					
					 The recent bilateral contacts held at various levels showed that there is great potentiality for developing mutual cooperation from a fresh angle.
					
					 We will act together with the DPRK to give full play to it.

articles.title: Russian Charge d'Affaires A.I. Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Russian Charge d'Affaires A.I. Hosts Reception
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Alexandr Minaev, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Russian embassy here, hosted a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club Friday on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Present there on invitation were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Ri Ryong Nam, minister of External Economic Relations, Pak Chun Nam, minister of Culture, Ri Yong Chol, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, No Kwang Chol, first vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Sim Kuk Ryong, director of the General Bureau for Affairs with Diplomatic Corps, and officials concerned.
					
					 Present there were a delegation of the Russian Federation Council led by Vice-Chairman Yevgeni Bushmin, a delegation of the Ministry of Defense of the Russian Federation led by Aleksandr Lapin, first vice commander and chief of staff of the Eastern Military District of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation, and staff members of the Russian embassy.
					
					 Alexandr Minaev in a speech expressed thanks to the government and people of the DPRK for preserving well the cemeteries and monuments to the fallen Soviet soldiers, always remembering the feats performed by soldiers of the Red Army in the bloody battles against the Japanese imperialist aggression army.
					
					 He referred to the high-level visits between the two countries and cooperation in different fields this year.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop said that August 15 seven decades ago was a significant day when President Kim Il Sung defeated the Japanese imperialists in the protracted and rigorous anti-Japanese war and brought a historic event heralding the birth of new Korea.
					
					 On the day of Korea's liberation the Korean people pay respects to the noble internationalist spirit of the fallen Soviet soldiers who laid down their lives in the final sacred war to prevail over the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 A reception was given at the Russian consulate general in Chongjin on the same day.

articles.title: Tablet to Honor Kim Jong Il Unveiled in Russia
articles.content:
Tablet to Honor Kim Jong Il Unveiled in Russia
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- A tablet to honor leader Kim Jong Il was unveiled at a restaurant in Vladivostok, Russia.
					 Written on the tablet were letters "Generalissimo of the DPRK Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK visited our restaurant during his visit to the Far East District of the Russian Federation on Aug. 24, 2002" in Russian and Korean.
					
					 An unveiling ceremony of the tablet took place on the spot on Aug. 10.
					
					 The general manager of the Resnaya Zaimka Co. Ltd and the DPRK consul general unveiled the tablet.
					
					 A floral basket, bouquets and flowers were laid before the tablet.
					
					 The former chief of the Khasan District Administrative Office said that he could not forget the time he was greeting Kim Jong Il at Khasan Railway Station.
					
					 The vice-director of the Export and External Economic Activities Bureau of the Ministry of Development of Far East said that the bilateral  relations are rapidly developing in recent days, adding that all this was ascribable to Kim Jong Il who visited the Far Eastern areas of the Russian Federation in 2002 and provided a solid foundation for the development of the bilateral relations.
					
					 He expressed his will to closely cooperate with the DPRK to raise the level of the Russia-DPRK economic cooperation, deeply aware of the importance of the cooperative relations between the two countries.
					
					 The vice-major of the Vladivostok City said that the tablet clearly proves that the Russia-DPRK relations are developing at a high level and his administrative office will make due efforts to develop the cooperation and exchange with the DPRK in conformity with it.

					 They also visited the Arch of Triumph.

articles.title: Immortal Feats Performed by Kim Il Sung for National Liberation
articles.content:
Immortal Feats Performed by Kim Il Sung for National Liberation
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- With the approach of the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation (Aug. 15) from Japan's colonial rule, the Korean people and progressives of the world are recollecting the undying feats President Kim Il Sung performed in the struggle for national liberation.
					 In the whole course of the anti-Japanese armed struggle, he had adhered to the principle of independence.
					
					 In his speeches made at historic meetings, including Kalun Meeting in June Juche 19 (1930) and Dahuangwai Meeting in February 1935, and his famous work "The Tasks of Korean Communists", he clarified the Juche-oriented stand that the country's liberation should be achieved by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation.
					
					 And he set forth slogans "Oppose arms with arms, and oppose counterrevolutionary violence with revolutionary violence!" and "Let us carry out the Korean revolution by our own efforts!"
					
					 After declaring a war against the Japanese imperialist aggressors, he launched an armed struggle in an organized way and finally achieved the national liberation.
					
					 The victory in the anti-Japanese revolutionary war was an event of great significance in the 20th century, which greatly encouraged the oppressed nations of the world in their national liberation struggle and instilled in them the truth that they could achieve national liberation when they turn out in the struggle with firm belief in their own strength.
					
					 Later, state leaders of many countries, including Cuba, Vietnam, Zimbabwe and Mozambique, praised the anti-Japanese armed struggle led by Kim Il Sung as a precious model of the national liberation struggle to be followed by the peoples in colonies.
					
					 The immortal feats of the President, who ushered in a new era of upsurge in the national liberation movement, will shine long with the era of independence.

articles.title: Film Show Held to Mark Anniversary of Korea's Liberation
articles.content:
Film Show Held to Mark Anniversary of Korea's Liberation
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- A film show was held at the People's Palace of Culture Friday on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Present there were Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as a vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Solidarity with the World People, officials concerned, working people in the city, the visiting foreign delegations and delegates for celebrating the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation, foreign diplomatic envoys and staff members of foreign embassies here.
					
					 The participants watched a Korean documentary "For the Liberation of the Country" Part 20 dealing with the revolutionary exploits of President Kim Il Sung, who led the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle to victory, liberating Korea.

articles.title: Great Paektu Range Photo Exhibition Opens in DPRK
articles.content:
Great Paektu Range Photo Exhibition Opens in DPRK
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- A photo exhibition of Great Paektu Range was opened at the Grand People's Study House on Friday to celebrate the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation. It was co-sponsored by the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and the Korea-New Zealand Friendship Association.
					 Displayed at the exhibition hall are photos showing the landscape of the three thousand-ri land extending from Mt. Paektu to Mt. Halla on Jeju Island.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Song Ja Rip, vice-president of the Grand People's Study House, Pak Kyong Il, chairman of the Korea-New Zealand Friendship Association, officials concerned, working people in the city, Roger Shepherd, managing director of Hike Korea, delegations and delegates to the international solidarity event for celebrating the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation, foreign diplomatic envoys and staff members of foreign embassies here and overseas Koreans staying in the homeland.
					
					 Speakers said that Mt. Paektu is the holy mountain of the sun and the ancestral mountain of the Korean nation where President Kim Il Sung led the 20 year-long anti-Japanese war to victory to achieve the historic cause of national liberation and leader Kim Jong Il was born and nurtured the grit and spirit as the illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Great Paektu Range is symbolizing the homogeneity of the Korean nation, they said, adding Korea will be surely reunified.
					
					 The participants went round the photos.

articles.title: Red Flag Relay Groups of Service Personnel Arrive in Panmunjom
articles.content:
Red Flag Relay Groups of Service Personnel Arrive in Panmunjom
Kaesong, August 14 (KCNA) -- The red flag relay of service personnel of the Korean People's Army was successfully conducted after starting from Mt. Paektu.
					 The groups of the relay running along the east and west coastal areas arrived in Kaesong on Thursday.
					
					 Service personnel laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statue of President Kim Il Sung in Kaesong City and paid tribute to him.
					
					 That day they went round a post of Mt. Taedok and held a meeting of talking combat feats performed by guard units.
					
					 They visited Panmunjom on Friday.
					
					 Before the monument inscribed with Kim Il Sung's autographic signature they recollected the feats of the peerlessly great persons who devoted themselves to the reunification of the country. Then they went round various places in Panmunjom.
					
					 Then they held a meeting.
					
					 Present there were Lieutenant General of the Korean People's Army  Ryom Chol Song, and service personnel of the ground, naval and air and anti-air force.
					
					 At the meeting Ri Chang Gil, chairman of the Committee of the Korean People's Army of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, made a report.
					
					 The reporter said the service personnel keenly felt the personality of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu who liberated the country and demonstrated the dignity of the country and nation, holding high the banner of Songun while visiting battle sites of the anti-Japanese war, Chol Pass, Kamnamu Company, the monument to feats of 14 fighters of human bombs, graves of naval fighters, etc.
					
					 He underlined the need to dynamically advance to bring earlier national reunification and the final victory for the building of a thriving nation in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu under the leadership of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					
					 speakers pledged to wipe out the aggressors by the arms of Mt. Paektu and build a reunified prosperous country on this land under the unfurled red flag stained with blood shed by the forerunners if the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group of traitors ignite a war.

articles.title: Revolutionary Songs Created in Anti-Japanese War Period
articles.content:
Revolutionary Songs Created in Anti-Japanese War Period
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Revolutionary songs created during the anti-Japanese armed struggle led by President Kim Il Sung are still getting popular in the DPRK.
					 All of the songs are run through with the indomitable spirit of the anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters to defeat the enemy no matter how often they may have to die.
					
					 Among them are "Guerrilla March", "Song of the Revolutionary Army", "Merry Dancing Music", "Song of General Mobilization" and "Song of the Red Flag".
					
					 The songs were spread among members of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army and popular masses, encouraging them to take active part in the anti-imperialist revolutionary struggle.

articles.title: Open-air Ice Rink in Pyongyang Crowed with Visitors
articles.content:
Open-air Ice Rink in Pyongyang Crowed with Visitors
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The People's Open-air Ice Rink on the bank of the Taedong River in Pyongyang is now crowded with visitors fond of skating.
					 The crinkly-roofed ice rink has a plottage of 6 469 square meters.
					
					 According to its chief engineer Ji Tong Il, more than 200 citizens per hour enjoy themselves at the rink everyday and they include children and aged persons.
					
					 The employees of the rink have striven to improve their service for visitors, Ji said.
					
					 Jong Pom Hui, a student of Kim Chaek University of Technology, told KCNA that she learned how to skate by frequenting the ice rink.
					
					 Kim Kuk Jin, a worker of the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex, said: The weather is now sweltering, but my family has just enjoyed skating at this splendid rink. I dare say that my socialist country is best in the world as such luxurious buildings serve the working masses.

articles.title: Coach of World Champion Admired
articles.content:
Coach of World Champion Admired
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Kuk Hyang of the DPRK won the diving women's 10m platform title at the 16th FINA World Championships.
					 After all she brought home the first gold medal in the world swimming event.
					
					 Behind her admirable success were the painstaking efforts of her coach Sin Jong Rim.
					
					 In this regard, Kim Chun Ok, an official of the Federation of Sports Technique, told KCNA:
					
					 Sin Jong Rim, 40 years old now, proved successful at the women's one meter springboard diving in the First Military World Games held in Italy at the age of 20.
					
					 Then she graduated from Korea University of Physical Education and worked at the Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports before starting her career as a coach of the April 25 Sports Team.
					
					 She had made tireless and devoted efforts to develop the diving skills of Kim Kuk Hyang as her first trainee at the team.
					
					 She was awarded the title of People's Athlete, along with Kim.

articles.title: Top Prizes Awarded to DPRK Women Footballers by EAFF
articles.content:
Top Prizes Awarded to DPRK Women Footballers by EAFF
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Top prizes of the 2015 EAFF Women's East Asian Cup and the East Asian Cup were awarded to the DPRK players.
					 During the international games held in Wuhan, China the DPRK team registered a series of successes in the games with its Japanese, Chinese and south Korean rivals and won again in the wake of their victory in 2013.
					
					 The EAFF conferred top scorer prize on Ra Un Sim, captain of the DPRK team, top player prize on Wi Jong Sim and top defender prize on Kim Nam Hui.
					
					 Ra scored three goals.
					
					 Meanwhile, Ri Myong Guk, player of the DPRK men's football team, received top goalkeeper prize of the 2015 EAFF East Asian Cup.

articles.title: U.S. Trick Aimed at Military Supremacy Disclosed
articles.content:
U.S. Trick Aimed at Military Supremacy Disclosed
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The U.S. chief of the general staff of navy-designate  at a recent confirmation hearing at the Senate Armed Services Committee blustered the biggest threat to the U.S. navy in the Asia-Pacific is "north Korea's provocations and its bolstered capability of ballistic missiles."
					 He cried out for "tightening the ties with the U.S. allies in the region and steadily bolstering up their capabilities in order to defuse security threat" and "reinforcing naval force for defence in the Pacific region".
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday in a commentary says the U.S. stereo-typed talk about "provocation" and "threat" is aimed to justify its arms buildup under such pretext.
					
					 Clear is the aim sought by the U.S. in vociferating about "threat" and "provocation" from the DPRK, the news analyst says, and goes on:
					
					 It seeks to tighten military alliance for aggression in the Asia-Pacific region, reinforce armed force and thus contain big powers in the region, namely China and Russia, and hold military supremacy.
					
					 It is the invariable ambition of the U.S. in the new century to dominate the world with the Asia-Pacific as a springboard.
					
					 With no sleight of hand can the U.S. regain its declining position as a hegemonic force in the region.
					
					 No matter what rhetoric the U.S. may let loose about "threat" and "provocation", it can never cover up its dirty colors as the arch criminal escalating the tension on the Korean peninsula and disturbing the world peace.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Moves for Retrogressive Revision of Domestic Laws Termed Crimes
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Moves for Retrogressive Revision of Domestic Laws Termed Crimes
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The Korean Jurists Committee released a white paper Friday to disclose before the international community the danger and illegality of the moves stepped up by the Japanese reactionaries for the retrogressive revision of domestic laws to opt for overseas aggression after discarding even the spurious mask of "peace-loving state" which it has so far donned for mere form's sake.
					 Having built economic and military muscle under the zealous patronage of the U.S. imperialists after the Second World War, Japan has made full military preparations for independently carrying out any war of  aggression and laid a certain legal foundation for joining in other wars behind the facade of  "the Pacifist Constitution", the white paper said, and went on:
					
					 What remains to be done by Japan now is just to readjust and round off domestic laws for launching overseas aggression at will anywhere in the world under the pretext of the "right to collective self-defence", unhindered by the "constitution".
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' above-said moves are a wanton violation of norms of international law.
					
					 Those moves of the Japanese reactionaries are above all criminal acts of blatantly challenging the international conventions which confirmed Japan's state as a war criminal state and a defeated nation.
					
					 The Potsdam Declaration on July 26, 1945 clarifies such issues as the issue of making sure Japanese soldiers go back their home and lead a peaceful life after the total disarmament of the Imperial Japanese Army, the issue of making the Japanese government take all possible democratic measures inside the country, the issue of preventing Japan from having access to industry which can help it rearm itself for a war and the need for the Japanese government to immediately declare the unconditional surrender of the Japanese Army and the issue of making sincere efforts for its implementation.
					
					 The Potsdam Declaration became not just the unilateral declaration of the Allied Powers but a document agreed upon by a victor nation and a defeated nation through the Japanese government's series of official acceptances of the "notice on accepting Potsdam declaration" and "Japan's surrender document", and an international document of strong binding force that confined the position of Japan as a defeated nation under law.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' moves are acts of seriously threatening the principle on peaceful settlement of international disputes.
					
					 The "declaration on principle of international law on friendship and cooperation among countries in line with UN Charter" that was adopted as Resolution No. 2625 (XXV) at the 25th UN General Assembly on October 24, 1970 specified the principle on seeking peaceful settlement of international disputes by countries so as not to imperil global peace, security and justice, thus reaffirming the basic principle of the UN Charter on peaceful settlement of international disputes.
					
					 But the Japanese reactionaries have persistently moved to realize overseas aggression by force under their former spurious signboard which read "Japan would abstain once for all from threat by war and armed forces or recourse to the armed forces as a means for settling international disputes", which is specified in article 9 of the current constitution.
					
					 Japan's moves for retrogressive revision of domestic laws are criminal acts in breach of "the Pacifist Constitution" which was instituted in line with the international demand.
					
					 Even after the institution of the "Pacifist Constitution" the Japanese reactionaries, being displeased with it, have maneuvered by hook or by crook to revise it while "waiting for time to come" and make Japan "a country capable of possessing army and a country capable of fighting a war" under the constitution.
					
					 Japanese chief executive Abe at a press conference on May 15, 2014 stressed the need to have a new interpretation of the constitution, citing such pretexts that it is aimed to help overseas Japanese evacuate from dispute-torn areas, to cope with such threats as terrorism and cyber attack in cooperation with the international community under the banner of "pro-active pacifism" and "international cooperation" and to implement new "Japan-U.S. defence cooperation guidelines" that has faced a big change in the surrounding environment of Japan.
					
					 Clear is the aim sought by the Japanese reactionaries in giving up the retrogressive revision of the constitution and resorting to the method of changing the interpretation of the constitution.
					
					 Under the situation where there are growing domestic voices protesting against the retrogressive revision of the constitution and procedures for the revision require an approval by more than two thirds of members of the Diet and national referendum, Japan finds it hard to achieve the goal. So they now seek to clear the barrier of the constitution and realize their ambition for overseas aggression at any cost by employing an easier roundabout method.
					
					 The Japanese chief executive made the interpretation of article 9 of the constitution in favor of aggression and war. As a matter of fact, "the Pacifist Constitution" no longer exists in Japan. 
					
					 However, in Japan the "Japan-U.S. defence cooperation guidelines" are above the "Pacifist Constitution", creating the abnormal situation where the guidelines hold sway over the institution and revision of all domestic laws.
					
					 As seen above, the desperate moves for the retrogressive revision of domestic laws are neither a simple revision of some phrases and expressions nor the revision for maintaining peace and security as touted by the Japanese chief executive.
					
					 This is an extremely dangerous bellicose act aimed to realize militarization and overseas expansion at any cost.

articles.title: Minju Joson Dismisses Park Geun Hye's Hysteric Remarks
articles.content:
Minju Joson Dismisses Park Geun Hye's Hysteric Remarks
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye blustered at a meeting of chief secretaries of Chongwadae on Aug. 10 that she "regretted" the DPRK's reset of standard time and it is "contrary to the efforts for peaceful reunification".
					 She went the lengths of jabbering that the DPRK's recent measure caused the "concern of aggravating the heterogeneity," urging it to opt for "restoring the national homogeneity and commonness."
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Friday says that what she uttered is nothing but the hysteric gossip of a dolt who does not know how the national dignity is protected and of a guy hell-bent on the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north and sycophancy towards Japan.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Japanese imperialists deprived Korea of its standard time and forced it to use their standard time in order to completely exterminate the Korean nation and turn Korea into their permanent colony.
					
					 The standard time recently fixed by the DPRK is an entirely just measure reflecting the will of its people and other compatriots to force the Japanese imperialists to pay for the unprecedented crimes committed by them against the Korean nation without fail and demonstrate the dignity and might of Songun Korea before the world.
					
					 This notwithstanding, Park hurled mud at the DPRK's fixing of the standard time, an unpardonable political-motivated provocation against it.
					
					 Through her recent reckless remarks, she revealed once again the true colors of the family of wicked pro-Japanese lackeys.
					
					 Park had better stop recklessly wagging her tongue, bearing in mind that her remarks slandering the fellow countrymen in the north would only bring her shame and ruin.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces Warned against Reckless Leaflet-scattering Operations against DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces Warned against Reckless Leaflet-scattering Operations against DPRK
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces have reached an extreme phase in their leaflet-scattering operations against the DPRK.
					 Riff-raffs affiliated to the Voice of Martyr, a puppet die-hard conservative organization in south Korea, scattered by use of balloons anti-DPRK leaflets over areas in the DPRK from the area of Hapsu-ri in Jung-myon of Ryonchon County, Kyonggi Province on July 24.
					
					 Similar operations were conducted by other south Korean die-hard conservative bodies in the area of Aegibong, Jogang-ri, Wolgot-myon in Kimpho City, Kyonggi Province on July 27 and in the area of Rodongdangsa, Jung-ri, Cholwon County of south Korean Kangwon Province on July 31.
					
					 Entering August, the puppet forces have got zealous in scattering anti-DPRK leaflets and various kinds of undesirable e-media as evidenced by their scattering operations on August 5, 6 and 7. They conducted 3 to 5 operations in June and 9 operations in July.
					
					 They are getting trickier in fixing time and locations for their scattering operations against the DPRK.
					
					 In view of this critical situation, the frontline combined units of the Korean People's Army released an open statement on August 14.
					
					 What is more serious is that the die-hard conservative bodies have conducted anti-DPRK leaflet-scattering operations with the tacit connivance of the south Korean regime and military, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The south Korean puppet joint chiefs of staff named the anti-DPRK leaflet scattering operations of the non-governmental reactionary organizations "balloon operations", gave an "order" to all frontline guard units and artillery units to "tighten vigilance against the north" and "get ready to open fire."
					
					 The operations for massively scattering anti-DPRK leaflets and undesirable e-media that have spilt over to the whole area along the military demarcation line are an open declaration of a war against the DPRK.
					
					 If one side mobilizes forces while conducting a psychological warfare against its opponent, that just leads to a total war.
					
					 Now that such large-scale joint military drills as Ulji Freedom Guardian are close at hand, the Park Geun Hye group has launched such a large-scale psychological warfare as leaflet-scattering operations. This clearly proves that the north-south relations have been plunged into the state of a war, in actuality.
					
					 The puppet forces should not forget even a moment that the whole of south Korea might turn into a sea of fire due to the foolhardy leaflet scattering operations.
					
					 There is a limit to the patience of the frontline soldiers of the KPA.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces Warned of Due Punishment
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces Warned of Due Punishment
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- "Mine explosion" of an unknown cause occurred in the vicinity of the south Korean puppet MP post in the southern portion of the demilitarized zone of the Military Demarcation Line in the area of Pangmok-ri, Kunnae-myon, Phaju City, Kyonggi Province on Aug. 4.
					 The puppet forces announced right after the occurrence that plastic anti-personnel mine M-14, which was laid in the vicinity of the MP post in the southern portion of the demilitarized zone, went off due to strong torrential rain. 
					
					 On Aug. 10, Kim Min Sok appeared at a press conference as a spokesman for the puppet Defense Ministry and asserted that the "mine explosion" occurred as the "north illegally crossed the MDL and deliberately laid wooden box mine".
					
					 The Policy Department of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK issued a statement on Friday as regards the fact that the south Korean puppet military, the puppet joint chiefs of staff and Chongwadae talked volumes about the "mine explosion," labeling it "provocation from the north" and even the UN joined in the smear campaign against the DPRK.
					
					 The statement proved the hypocrisy of their absurd claim that parts of a wooden box mine produced by the puppet forces as "convincing evidence strongly smells of resin" and the " wooden box mine is from the north" and three "fresh springs are also from it."
					
					 There are too many instances to give the lie to the "provocation from the north" touted by the puppet forces, the statement said, and went on: 
					
					 It is a bad habit of the south Korean puppet forces to groundlessly link whatever deplorable event occurs in south Korea with the north.
					
					 They seek a sinister aim whenever they orchestrate a ridiculous farce. 
					
					 The recent case clearly proved that the Park Geun Hye group has made desperate efforts to pass the buck for the strained north-south relations to the DPRK and secure a pretext for justifying such moves to escalate the confrontation with the compatriots as anti-DPRK leaflet scattering operation.
					
					 This was clearly evidenced by the fact that they resumed psychological warfare broadcasting to brand the recent case "as provocation from the north". 
					
					 Taking advantage of the recent case, the puppet minister of Defense asked his American master to heighten the intensity of Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises by introducing B-2A and F-22A to south Korea.
					
					 Aware of the curse and resentment of all compatriots at the projected saber-rattling targeting the north, the puppet forces are hyping "provocation" and "threat" from the north in a bid to justify the war exercises detrimental to peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 Their much ado about "provocation from the north" is nothing but a last resort to calm down the strong criticism of the recent "mine explosion" in the DMZ in the wake of war phobia, declining military discipline and various scandals rampant in the puppet army.
					
					 The puppet forces were so ridiculous as to woo the delegate of the DPRK into dialogue under the pretext of discussing the recent shocking case after faking it up.
					
					 Hateful was the behavior of the U.S. joining in the above-said burlesque.
					
					 The DPRK has an inspection group of the NDC which guarantees impartiality and accuracy in making a military, scientific and technological investigation into the case.
					
					 The more loudly the Park Geun Hye group talks about "provocation from the north," a fiction, the bitterer disgrace of being tricksters and liars it will face.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are watching with vigilance the provokers' ever more reckless confrontation row.
					
					A reckless provocation is bound to invite a due punishment.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Discloses U.S. Forces' Drug Smuggling
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Discloses U.S. Forces' Drug Smuggling
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People editorially disclosed and condemned the heinous drug smuggling committed by the U.S. imperialist aggressors in south Korea on August 12.
					The editorial recalled that the U.S. forces in south Korea smuggled drugs enough for 150,000 persons to use from 2010 to 2014 through military mail.
					
					 The editorial attributed such unlimited shipment of such dangerous substance directly threatening the life and security of the south Korean people to the unequal SOFA.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Denounces Regime for Scuttling Joint National Event
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Denounces Regime for Scuttling Joint National Event
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty in south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on August 12 censuring the Park Geun Hye puppet regime for scuttling the joint national event for marking August 15, the anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 When the preparatory work for the event was underway, the regime unreasonably interfered in it, barring representatives of the south, the north and abroad from holding the joint event.
					
					 The Park regime, by origin, had not allowed NGOs to take the lead in sponsoring the event, they charged.
					
					 Noting the regime doesn't hope for peaceful reunification, they continued:
					
					 Park often talks about "unification" but her behavior is quite contrary to it.
					
					 She is still keeping the "May 24 measure" in force to block north-south exchange and the tour of Mt. Kumgang, a symbol of north-south reconciliation, has not yet been resumed.
					
					 Despite the strong opposition by the north, the UN "office for human rights in the north" was set up in Seoul in June last.

articles.title: South Koreans Call for Peace and Reunification on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
South Koreans Call for Peace and Reunification on Korean Peninsula
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The vanguard for reunification of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions and the 2015 Youth March Group for Reunification have launched actions calling for achieving peace and reunification on the Korean peninsula across south Korea including Seoul, Taejon, Taegu, Kunsan and Jonju of North Jolla Province and Phyongthaek of Kyonggi Province.
					 They held a kick-off ceremony outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul on August 10.
					
					 The speakers at the ceremony said the Park Geun Hye regime is wholly to blame for the abortive joint national event for marking the 15th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 They censured the regime for failing to protest against GIs hell-bent on germ weapon experiments after illegally introducing anthrax germs into south Korea.
					
					 They declared that they would stage actions in various parts of south Korea protesting the U.S. and demanding thorough probe into the truth, withdrawal of germ warfare unit and apology of the U.S. president.
					
					 Then the 2015 Youth March Group for Reunification held a ceremony demanding the U.S. president's apology for the anthrax germ experiments by the U.S. forces.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony they marched as far as the Japanese embassy in Seoul.
					
					 In front of the embassy they held a rally, denouncing Japan for distorting history and reviving militarism.

articles.title: Works of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Posted on Swiss Homepage
articles.content:
Works of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Posted on Swiss Homepage
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea posted on its homepage the full texts of President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Achieve the Great Unity of Our Nation" and leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" on August 5.
					 The President's work, published on August 1, Juche 80 (1991), says that the Korean nation is the driving force for national reunification, and indicates the tasks and ways for achieving the great unity of the whole nation.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's work, published on August 4, Juche 86 (1997), deals with the immortal exploits performed by the President for the cause of national reunification.
					
					 The work formulates the three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the three charters for national reunification and indicates the tasks for accomplishing the cause of national reunification and the ways to do so on the basis of them.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Romanian Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Romanian Organization on Its Website
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The Romanian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted on its website "The Juche Idea" the full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" on Aug. 6.
					 The work, published on August 4, Juche 86 (1997), deals with the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung for the cause of national reunification.
					
					 The work formulates the three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the three charters for national reunification and indicates the tasks for accomplishing the cause of national reunification and the ways to do so on the basis of them.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats for Country's Liberation Praised by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats for Country's Liberation Praised by Foreign Figures
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Denmark, a DPRK photo exhibition in Angola and a lecture was given in Guinea under the sponsorship of preparatory committees for celebrating the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation on Aug. 6 and 7. 
					 Displayed there were photos documenting the feats of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 H. Jacobsen, member of the Leadership of the Communist Party in Denmark and co-chairman of the Danish preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of the Workers' Party of Korea and Korea's liberation, said that Korea's liberation would be unthinkable without the leadership of the President. 
					
					 The chairman of the Angolan preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation said that the President was the sun of the nation, peerless patriot and the greatest man recognized by the world who brought the liberation of the country to the Korean people.
					
					 Secouna Camara, director general of the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea and member of the Guinean preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of the WPK and Korea's liberation, noted that the President's feats for the country's liberation would always go down in the world history of the anti-imperialist national liberation struggle.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Praise Feats of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Praise Feats of Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung was the great benefactor who liberated the country and provided the Korean people with genuine freedom and happiness in the 20th century and Marshal Kim Jong Un is the peerlessly great man who will reunify the country and provide the Korean people with a reunified powerful state in the 21st century.
					 The Swiss preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of the Workers' Party of Korea and Korea's liberation, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on Aug. 3 on the occasion of August 15, Korea's liberation anniversary.
					
					 The President liberated the country from the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists on Aug. 15, 1945, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The Korean people are highly praising the President as the heaven-sent great man, benefactor of the liberation and hero of the nation.
					
					 The long history of the DPRK has been recorded as the epic of proud victory in which socialism, where popular masses are masters of their destinies, was built.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days Marked in Switzerland, Iran
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days Marked in Switzerland, Iran
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- A celebration and film show were held in Switzerland and round-table talks and film show in Iran on Aug. 8 and 9 on the occasion of the Day of Songun and the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Films shown included Korean films "The Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum" and "Masikryong Ski Resort".
					
					 Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland－Korea Committee and chairman of the Swiss preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of the Workers' Party of Korea and Korea's liberation, said that leader Kim Jong Il resolutely smashed the U.S. imperialists' moves for provoking a new war, reliably defended socialist Korea and turned the DPRK into an invincible political and military power.
					
					 The chairman of the Al Hadi Islam Propaganda Organization of Iran noted that President Kim Il Sung was a peerless patriot and hero of the nation who embarked on the national liberation struggle against the Japanese imperialists in his teens and liberated Korea from their colonial rule.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at an event held in Switzerland.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days to Be Celebrated in Hungary
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days to Be Celebrated in Hungary
Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- A Hungarian preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of Korea's liberation and the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) was formed in Budapest on August 10.
					 Gyula Thurmer, chairman of the Hungarian Workers' Party, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to adopt a congratulatory message to supreme leader Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.

articles.title: Departamento de Politica de CDN de RPDC advierte al Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Departamento de Politica de CDN de RPDC advierte al Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 14 de agosto (ACNC) -- El pasado dia 4, ocurrio un incidente de "explosion de mina" en los alrededores del puesto de gendarme del ejercito surcoreano titere situado al sur de la zona desmilitarizada de la Linea de Demarcacion Militar en la comuna de Pangmok del canton de Kunnae de la ciudad de Phaju de la provincia de Kyonggi. 
					Al principio, los titeres surcoreanos anunciaron que el incidente fue ocasionado por la mina antipersonal plastica M-14 arrasada por las lluvias torrenciales.
					
					Unos dias despues, especificamente, el dia 10, en una conferencia de prensa, el vocero del Ministerio de Defensa, Kim Min Sok, disparateo que el incidente fue ocurrido por el Norte de Corea que "infiltro ilegalmente en la Linea de Demarcacion Militar y coloco intencionalmente la mina de madera".
					
					El circulo militar surcoreano, la Junta de Jefes de Estado Mayor del ejercito titere surcoreano y Chongwadae dicen que la "explosion de mina" es una "provocacion del Norte", y hasta la ONU cuestiona a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Al respecto, el Departamento de Politica del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC hizo publica el dia 14 una declaracion.
					
					La nota revela la absurdidad de los "testigos decisivos" presentados por los titeres surcoreanos, o sea, los restos de la mina con "fuerte olor resinoso", la "mina de madera del Norte" y los "tres muelles intactos". 
					
					No alcanzara el tiempo para revelar las falsedades de la insistencia de los titeres surcoreanos en la "provocacion del Norte", senala y continua:
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos estan acostumbrados al vicio de acusar sin ton ni son a la RPDC en el caso de una desgracia en el suelo surcoreano. 
					
					Lo que no podemos pasar por alto es que todos complots anti-RPDC del Sur de Corea persiguen malsanos objetivos. 
					
					Esta vez, se ha revelado el hecho de que la camarilla de Park Geun-hye vino tramando urdid para imputar a la RPDC la culpabilidad de la tension de las relaciones intercoreanas y preparar el pretexto para justificar la confrontacion fratricida como el lanzamiento de los volantes de contenido anti-RPDC. 
					
					Lo testimonia el hecho de que los titeres surcoreanos reiniciaron la radiodifusion psicologica inmediatamente despues de que determinaron el presente caso como "provocacion del Norte". 
					
					Ademas, tomandolo como pretexto, el ministro de Defensa decidio introducir los cazabombarderos estrategicos B-2A y el avion Stealth F-22A Raptor en el suelo surcoreano a fin de aumentar el grado de los ejercicios militares conjuntos Ulji Freedom Guardian. 
					
					Al darse cuenta del odio y la colera de todos los coreanos al entrenamiento de guerra de agresion al Norte, los titeres surcoreanos intentaron dar la necesidad absoluta a tal locura militar que marcha a contrapelo de la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana falsificando el presente incidente como "provocacion" y "amenaza" de la RPDC.
					
					El rumor de "provocacion del Norte" deviene tambien la ultima medida para evitar la censura fuerte que sera causada por el caso en cuestion ocurrido en la zona desmilitarizada junto con la idea pesimista sobre la guerra, la relajacion de la disciplina y orden del ejercito y las malversaciones de varios tipos que reinan en la capa militar titere.
					
					Absurdamente, los titeres que inventaron el reciente caso persiguieron la mala intencion de introducir a la RPDC en el lugar de dialogo so pretexto de discutirlo.
					
					Tambien, es absurda la conducta grosera de EE.UU. que se unio con la farsa de su lacayo.
					
					En la RPDC existe el grupo de inspeccion del CDN que da la imparcialidad y la exactitud en revelar de manera militar y cientifico-tecnica todos los casos.
					
					Cuanto mas vociferan la absurda "provocacion del Norte" tanto mas se revelara la naturaleza de la horda de Park Geun-hye como delito habitual de complot y falsificacion.
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo de Corea observan atentamente nueva locura conflictiva de los provocadores que se desarrolla imprudentemente.
					
					La provocacion imprudente causara sin falta el castigo merecido.

articles.title: MINREX denuncia "declaracion de 70o aniversario de posguerra" de premier Abe
articles.content:
MINREX denuncia "declaracion de 70o aniversario de posguerra" de premier Abe
Pyongyang, 14 de agosto (ACNC) -- En relacion con que con motivo del 70o aniversario de la derrota del imperialismo japones se revelo claramente el intento de las fuerzas conservadoras derechistas de Japon tendentes a encubrir su pasado criminal, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 14 una declaracion como sigue:
					En la "declaracion del 70o aniversario de posguerra" del premier japones Abe, publicada a traves de la resolucion de la conferencia ministerial del Gabinete de Japon, no contiene nada el reconocimiento sincero y la disculpa por la historia de agresion de Japon.
					
					La agresion de Japon a Corea y la dominacion colonial de mas de 40 anos fueron mas crueles y bestiales sin precedentes en la historia.
					
					Deviene la burla intolerable al pueblo coreano y el engano a la sociedad internacional el que habla de la responsabilidad y aporte en el futuro y en la sociedad internacional sin pedir disculpas ni reflexionarse con respecto a que Japon no liquida todavia los imperdonables crimenes ni los incontables danos causados al pueblo coreano. 
					
					Despues de ser derrotado tambien, Japon tomo parte en la guerra coreana siguiendo la politica de agresion a Corea de Estados Unidos, reprimio a los coreanos residentes en Japon, impidio por todos los medios la reunificacion de Corea y ha venido recurriendo a las maniobras hostiles contra la RPDC. 
					
					De esta manera, Japon vino abultando su expediente criminal contra la nacion coreana. 
					
					Sin embargo, actua todavia con astucia para encubrir sus crimenes del pasado y disfrazarse de "contribuyente a la paz". 
					
					Rechazamos y denunciamos este proceder de Japon calificandolo de intento cinico que desafia a la soberania y dignidad de la RPDC, la justicia internacional y la conciencia de la humanidad. 
					
					En el siglo pasado Japon cautivado por la ilusion vana de la "esfera de coprosperidad de la gran Asia Oriental" perpetro las guerras de agresion contra los pueblos de Asia y otros continentes imponiendoles incontables desastres y por fin sufrio la derrota. 
					
					Japon debe ganar primero la confianza de Corea y otros paises perifericos mediante la liquidacion de todos sus crimenes incluso las atrocidades cometidas contra el pueblo coreano, en lugar de optar por la agresion a ultramar y el resurgimiento del Estado de guerra bajo el cartel de "pacifismo activo". 
					
					Con el paso del tiempo se centuplica mas la voluntad del ejercito y pueblos coreanos de cobrar sin falta el precio de los crimenes de Japon y descargar el rencor arraigado.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con jefes y miembros de delegaciones de coreanos en ultramar

articles.title: Otorgados premios de FFEA a futbolistas de RPDC
articles.content:
Otorgados premios de FFEA a futbolistas de RPDC
Pyongyang, 14 de agosto (ACNC) -- Fueron otorgados a los futbolistas de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea los premios sobresalientes de la Copa Femenina del Este de Asia y de la Copa del Este de Asia, de 2015 de la Federacion de las Asociaciones de Futbol del Este de Asia (FFEA).
					Los torneos que se realizan bajo auspicios de la FFEA son juegos internacionales en que se disputan la supremacia los fuertes de varios paises y regiones de Asia Oriental.
					
					En la Copa Femenina del Este de Asia de 2015, efectuada hace poco en Wuhan de China, el once coreano ocupo de nuevo el primer lugar despues de 2013, al lograr victorias sucesivas en los juegos contra los rivales de Japon, China y el Sur de Corea.
					
					La FFEA otorgo a la capitana coreana Ra Un Sim, el premio de maxima goleadora, a Wi Jong Sim, el de jugadora sobresaliente y a Kim Nam Hui, el de defensa sobresaliente.
					
					En este certamen, Ra marco 3 goles de oro.
					
					Por otra parte, Ri Myong Guk de la seleccion coreana de futbol masculino recibio el premio de portero sobresaliente de la Copa del Este de Asia 2015 de la FFEA.

articles.title: Minju Joson comenta locuras histericas de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Minju Joson comenta locuras histericas de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 14 de agosto (ACNC) -- En una reunion de secretarios superiores de Chongwadae, efectuada el pasado dia 10, la mandataria surcoreana Pak Geun-hye echo maldiciones tales como "el nuevo establecimiento del tiempo estandar por la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea es una navegacion a contrapelo de los esfuerzos por la reunificacion pacifica", expresando el "pesar" por el respecto.
					Diciendo que "se preocupa de que se profundizara mas el caracter heterogeneo con tal medida", aconsejo atrevidamente a la RPDC que tenga el "camino de recuperacion de homogeneidad y correlatividad de la nacion".
					
					El presente ataque verbal de Park es una locura histerica de un tonto que no sabe como se defiende la dignidad de la nacion y del fanatico en actos projaponeses y la confrontacion fratricida.
					
					Asi inicia Minju Joson en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 14 y continua:
					
					Durante su ocupacion militar a Corea, el imperialismo japones arrebato el tiempo estandar coreano e impuso lo suyo al pueblo coreano para exterminar completamente la nacion coreana y convertir a Corea en su colonia eterna.
					
					Por tanto, el nuevo establecimiento del tiempo estandar de la RPDC deviene una medida sumamente justa que refleja la voluntad de todos los coreanos de saldar la cuenta final de los crimenes sin precedentes del imperialismo japones contra la nacion coreana y de manifestar a todo el mundo la dignidad y el poderio de la Corea del Songun.
					
					Sin embargo, Park echo maldiciones calumniando esta medida, lo que es otra imperdonable provocacion politica contra la RPDC.
					
					Con sus maldiciones antinacionales ella volvio a mostrar claramente la naturaleza de su familia pro-japonesa.
					
					Park debe actuar con prudencia teniendo clara cuenta de que su ofensiva verbal contra la nacion le dara solo ignominia y destruccion.
